awardSection.title:
Award-winning
AVIATION COMPANY
awardSection.description: Discover the most trusted and refined hot air balloon flight in Mexico — a seamless fusion of British precision and Mexican warmth. For over two decades, Flying Pictures Mexico has set the standard for safe, cinematic flights over the ancient pyramids of Teotihuacán.

tradition.title: More Than a Ride, a Tradition.
tradition.description: As you rise with the first light, the valley unfolds below: the Pyramid of the Sun, the Avenue of the Dead, and miles of golden horizon. Each moment feels carefully orchestrated — calm, elegant, and utterly unforgettable.

safety.title: Safety You Can See.
safety.description: Our senior pilots, all certified by Mexico's Civil Aviation Authority and fully trained to guide you to national standards, guide you with the confidence of many years dedicated flying balloons. Every flight includes full insurance, a traditional toast after landing, and the quiet joy of watching the morning awaken.

flightOptions.label: CHOOSE YOUR ASCENT
flightOptions.description: Solo travellers, friends, & couples. Fly in a shared compartmented basket that gives everyone their own corner of the sky. Add extras with transport options and breakfast.

reviews.dontJustTakeOurWord: Don't just take our word for it

weather.heading: We don't guess the weather. We monitor and understand it.
weather.description: Our decisions are based on real-time data, forecasts and probability. The weather is our co-pilot — and sometimes, he can be moody.

safetyPromise.title: The Safety Promise
safetyPromise.description: If the weather is not suitable, we don't fly. We would rather keep you on the ground than risk you in the air.

viewPromise.title: The View Promise
viewPromise.description: We fly to witness the awakening of the valley. Sometimes we are gifted with a golden sunrise; other times, a mystic mist wraps the pyramids in silence. Both spectacles are decided by nature.

footer.description: An award-winning Aviation Company. The premier provider of hot air balloon flights in Teotihuacán. Proudly operating Cameron Balloons UK since 1992.

privacy.introText: At Flying Pictures México, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our hot air balloon flight services.
privacy.dataIntro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacy.personalInfo: Personal information: Name, email address, phone number, address, and payment details when you make a reservation.
privacy.identificationInfo: Identification information: Passport, INE, or other official identification for identity verification.
privacy.healthInfo: Health information: Weight, relevant medical conditions, and physical restrictions to ensure your safety during the flight.
privacy.technicalInfo: Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and website usage data.
privacy.photosVideos: Photos and videos: Images taken during your flight experience (with your consent).
privacy.usageIntro: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.useProcess: To process and manage your flight reservations
privacy.useCommunicate: To communicate with you regarding confirmations, reminders, and relevant information
privacy.useSafety: To ensure your safety during the flight experience
privacy.useImprove: To improve our services and user experience
privacy.useLegal: To comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacy.useMarketing: To send promotional communications (with your consent)
privacy.usePayment: To process payments and prevent fraud
privacy.protectionText: We implement technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or disclosure. These measures include data encryption, restricted access controls, and industry-standard aviation security protocols.
privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You may control cookies through your browser settings.
privacy.sharingIntro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with:
privacy.sharingProviders: Service providers: Payment processors, communication services, and infrastructure providers.
privacy.sharingAuthorities: Regulatory authorities: When required by law, such as civil aviation authorities or security agencies.
privacy.sharingPartners: Business partners: Hotels, restaurants, and transportation services that are part of your experience (with your consent).
privacy.rightsIntro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.rightDelete: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.rightObject: Object to or restrict data processing
privacy.rightWithdraw: Withdraw your consent at any time
privacy.retentionText: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Reservation data may be retained for safety and legal compliance purposes.
privacy.minorsText: Our services are not intended for minors. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If you are a parent or legal guardian and believe a minor has provided us with personal information, please contact us so we can remove it.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any significant changes will be communicated by posting the updated policy on this page and revising the last updated date.

terms.introText: Welcome to Flying Pictures México. These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our hot air balloon flight services and our website. By making a reservation, participating in a flight, or using our website, you agree to these terms in full.
terms.servicesIntro: Flying Pictures México offers hot air balloon flight experiences over the archaeological zone of Teotihuacán. Our services include:
terms.serviceExtras: Additional services such as transportation and breakfast
terms.bookingIntro: To book a flight, you must:
terms.booking1: Provide accurate and up-to-date personal information, including valid identification.
terms.booking2: Provide accurate health information, including weight and any medical conditions.
terms.booking3: Complete full payment or the required deposit, depending on the reservation type.
terms.booking4: Confirm your reservation within the timeframe indicated at purchase.
terms.bookingNote: Reservation confirmation is subject to availability and favorable weather conditions.
terms.pricingIntro: Flight prices are displayed in Mexican Pesos (MXN) and include:
terms.priceInclude4: Champagne or non-alcoholic beverages (depending on the experience)
terms.priceNote: Prices do not include transportation to/from your hotel, gratuities, or additional services not expressly stated.
terms.requirementsIntro: To participate in our flights, you must meet the following requirements:
terms.reqAge: Age: Minimum age is 12 years. Minors must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian.
terms.reqWeight: Weight: Total passenger weight must be within the balloon’s operational limits. Additional charges may apply.
terms.reqHealth: Health: No serious medical conditions that prevent participation. Pregnant women over 20 weeks may not fly.
terms.reqDocs: Documentation: Valid photo identification (passport, INE, or driver’s license).
terms.safetyText: Safety is our top priority. All pilots are certified by Mexican civil aviation authorities and our balloons are regularly inspected. The pilot in command has final authority over all safety-related decisions, including flight cancellations or postponements.
terms.weatherText: Hot air balloon flights are weather-dependent. Flights operate only under safe conditions. If conditions are unsafe, the flight will be rescheduled or fully refunded.
terms.responsibilitiesIntro: By participating in our flights, you agree to:
terms.resp2: Maintain safe and respectful behavior at all times
terms.resp3: Not be under the influence of alcohol or controlled substances
terms.resp4: Disclose any relevant medical conditions prior to the flight
terms.resp5: Be responsible for any damage caused by personal negligence
terms.resp6: Arrive on time at the designated meeting point
terms.liabilityText: Flying Pictures México operates under applicable civil aviation regulations. Our liability is limited to the terms of our liability insurance. We are not responsible for delays, cancellations, or losses caused by events beyond our reasonable control.
terms.ipText: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, trademarks, and design, is the property of Flying Pictures México or used under license. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
terms.mediaText: During flights, photos and videos may be taken for promotional purposes. By flying with us, you grant permission for the use of your image unless you indicate otherwise prior to the flight.
terms.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon publication on our website.
terms.lawText: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Mexican States. Any dispute shall be resolved before the competent courts of the State of Mexico.

cancellation.introText: This Cancellation Policy outlines the terms and conditions applicable to cancellations, changes, and refunds for hot air balloon flight reservations with Flying Pictures México. By making a reservation, you agree to the terms described herein.
cancellation.customerIntro: If you need to cancel your reservation, the following conditions apply:
cancellation.refund48: 24-72 hours in advance: 50% refund or one free date change.
cancellation.refund24: Less than 24 hours in advance: No refund. Date change only, subject to availability.
cancellation.customerNote: All cancellations must be requested in writing via email. Refund processing takes 5–10 business days after approval.
cancellation.noshowText: Failure to arrive at the designated time and location results in no refund or date change. The no-show policy also applies if you arrive late and the balloon has already taken off.
cancellation.changesIntro: If you need to change your flight date:
cancellation.change72: 72+ hours in advance: Free change, subject to availability.
cancellation.change48: 24-72 hours in advance: One free change; additional changes may incur a 25% fee.
cancellation.change24: Less than 24 hours in advance: Change subject to availability with a 50% fee.
cancellation.changesNote: Date change requests must be made at least 4 hours prior to the scheduled flight time.
cancellation.weatherIntro: If we need to cancel your flight due to unsafe weather conditions, you may choose:
cancellation.weatherRefund: Full refund: 100% of your money will be refunded without deductions.
cancellation.weatherReschedule: Free rescheduling: Reprogram for the date of your choice at no extra cost.
cancellation.weatherCredit: Future credit: Credit valid for 12 months for use in any of our experiences.
cancellation.weatherNote: The decision to cancel due to weather is made exclusively by our certified pilot based on aviation regulations and safety standards.
cancellation.healthIntro: If you cannot fly due to health reasons:
cancellation.healthWithCert: With medical certificate: Full refund or free date change.
cancellation.healthWithoutCert: Without medical certificate: Standard cancellation policy applies.
cancellation.healthNote: Medical certificates must be issued by a licensed medical professional and must state that you cannot participate in aviation activities.
cancellation.process2: Include your reservation number and reason for cancellation.
cancellation.process4: Wait for confirmation of receipt (24–48 hours).
cancellation.process6: Refunds are issued to the original payment method.
cancellation.groupsText: For group reservations (8 or more people), specific policies apply. Please contact our groups team directly, as non-refundable deposits and different policies may exist.
cancellation.insuranceText: We recommend purchasing travel insurance that covers trip cancellations. Flying Pictures México offers the option to add cancellation insurance at the time of booking for an additional cost.
cancellation.exceptionsText: Flying Pictures México reserves the right to evaluate special and exceptional cases individually through our customer service team.

contact.heroSubtitle: We are morning people. How can we help?
contact.heroDescription: Whether you have a complex logistical question or just want to know if it's cold up there, our concierge team is standing by. No bots, just humans who know the sky.
contact.address: Carretera a las Pirámides, Teotihuacán, Edo. Mex. We are located 5 minutes from the archaeological zone.
contact.weRespond: We typically respond in under 5 minutes
contact.availabilityInfo: Availability, special dietary requests, proposal coordination, and weather checks.

hero.title: Prepare for Takeoff
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know before the alarm clock rings
hero.description: We know waking up at 4:30 AM requires willpower. Here is the operational manual to ensure your journey to the launch site is smooth, safe, and stress-free.

sunriseRitual.label: THE SUNRISE RITUAL
sunriseRitual.title: Why so early?
sunriseRitual.description: A hot air balloon is the only aircraft that floats within the wind rather than cutting through it. To do this safely, we need the atmosphere to be perfectly stable. This phenomenon, known as 'inversion,' only happens in the first hours of the day. We don't fly at dawn for the romance; we fly at dawn for the physics.

gettingHere.label: GETTING HERE
gettingHere.title: All Roads Lead to the Pyramids

shuttle.title: The Stress-Free Choice
shuttle.perks: The Perks: AC, seatbelts, and a nap on the way back.

selfDrive.title: Self Drive
selfDrive.description: If you have your own vehicle, the drive takes about 45-60 minutes from central CDMX.
selfDrive.parking: Parking: We offer secure, enclosed parking on-site at no extra cost.

weatherPolicy.label: WEATHER POLICY
weatherPolicy.title: Fairness First: Our Cancellation Policy
weatherPolicy.ifCancelDescription: You get a 100% Refund or a free reschedule for the next available date.
weatherPolicy.note: We are the only company with a strict 'No Fly' rule if the wind is tricky.

onionStrategy.title: The Onion Strategy
onionStrategy.description: It is crisp at 6:00 AM, but warm after landing. Wear layers.

footwear.title: Footwear
footwear.description: Wear comfortable, closed-toe shoes (sneakers or boots).

luggage.title: Luggage
luggage.description: Please bring only small backpacks. Large suitcases can be stored securely at our reception.

questions.afraidHeights: I am afraid of heights. Will I get dizzy?
questions.afraidHeightsAnswer: Surprisingly, no. Vertigo usually comes from a connection to the ground. The motion is so stable you could balance a coin on its edge.

flightExperiences.pageTitle: Hot Air Balloon Flight Experiences in Teotihuacán
flightExperiences.pageDescription: Soar above the Pyramids of Teotihuacán in a hot air balloon. Choose from shared flights, private flights, VIP tours and more.

hero.title: Soar Above the Pyramids
hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Adventure Awaits
hero.description: Experience the magic of Teotihuacán from the sky. Mexico's most spectacular sunrise awaits.

reasons.title: The Best Equipment Available.
reasons.description: We fly exclusively with Cameron Balloons UK, the world’s most trusted hot air balloons, crafted for performance, safety, and beauty.

reasons.title: Fewer Balloons, Better Views
reasons.description: We limit our daily flights to ensure calm operations, smaller groups, and clear horizons over Teotihuacán’s pyramids.

reasons.title: A British Mind, a Mexican Heart.
reasons.description: Founded by Sean and Diana Byrne, Flying Pictures blends precision engineering with genuine hospitality — every detail, designed with care.

cta.title: Ready to take off?
cta.description: Reserve your spot for the next sunrise. Limited spots available.

items.question: What does the flight include?
items.answer: The 60 min flight, certificate, buffet breakfast, transport and photos.

items.question: Is it safe to fly in a balloon?
items.answer: Yes, we operate with Cameron Balloons UK equipment and certified pilots.

items.question: Can I bring my camera?
items.answer: Of course! We recommend bringing your camera or phone.

items.question: What if there is bad weather?
items.answer: We offer a full refund or free reschedule.

timeline.title: Hotel Pickup
timeline.description: We pick you up at your hotel in the CDMX or Teotihuacán area.

timeline.title: Flight Briefing
timeline.description: Our team welcomes you at the Globoport for safety protocols.

timeline.title: Balloon Inflation
timeline.description: Watch the balloon come to life with hot air.

timeline.title: The Flight
timeline.description: Float gently over the pyramids as the first rays of sun paint the sky.

timeline.title: Landing and Celebration
timeline.description: Champagne toast and flight certificate delivery.

timeline.title: Buffet Breakfast
timeline.description: Full buffet breakfast with typical Mexican food and Mexican coffee.

guarantee.title: Our Guarantee
guarantee.weather: If weather doesn't allow flying, we refund 100%
guarantee.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

items.question: What if there is bad weather on my flight day?
items.answer: We offer a full refund or free reschedule. We don't fly in strong wind or rain.

items.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel up to 48 hours before for a full refund.

items.question: Are there weight restrictions?
items.answer: Yes, for safety, the maximum weight per person is 120 kg (265 lbs).

items.question: At what age can children fly?
items.answer: Children must be at least 6 years old to fly.

items.question: What should I bring?
items.answer: Layered clothing, closed-toe shoes, sunglasses, and a camera.
